title: Why do songs associate themselves with the location I listened to them and bring back vivid memories of exactly what I was doing at that time? - Quora

response.answer_text: You love music, or at least certain types of music. Me too. I have always associated some songs with what I was doing when I heard them on the radio as the current top 40. Thousands of songs, in fact. It’s a good memory thing you are using your brain for. You may even recall other circumstances within those times. Anyway, good for you!
